title: If a road is already widened on either side of the building which is to be taken up for repairs, such building can be taken up for repairs in conformity with (2) and (3) above, if it requires extensive repairs
clause_text: If a road is already widened on either side of the building which is to be taken up for repairs, such building can be taken up for repairs in conformity with (2) and (3) above, if it requires extensive repairs. Repairs may be allowed on sites under reservation, if the same is not under acquisition.
